p.d: Guests: Delgres The creole blues trio Delgres is named after a hero of the fight against slavery in the Caribbean. Pascal Danaé (guitar and vocals), Baptiste Brondy (drums) and Rafgee (sousaphone) create an abrasive trance rock sensation combining Caribbean sounds with Louisiana blues. Presented by: Sébastien Folin; directed by: Philippe Sommet.
